name: Timberman
overview: Bigger. Better. MORE CHOPS! The game loved by millions of players all around the world - Timberman, now has a brand new, polished axe! Are you world-class wood chopper? Enter the digital forest and find out! Discover the Nintendo 3DS version of this classic, casual game - slice and dice trees in an arcade-style, challenge your friends and be the fastest timberman alive! Timberman now features a single player challenge, to test your skills, unlock all characters, and have fun with your friends! Grab your trustworthy axe, become a true Timberman, and chop trees in 4, unique game modes: Classic Timberman: train your axe skills, gain exp, and beat your personal high score - in a classic, single-player, infinite tree mode. Chop as fast as you can and avoid branches! Prove you're the REAL THING! Hero mode: be the hero and rescue birds from their nest in burning woods - gain eternal glory and sweet loot! Can you reach the top of a tree? Race: join the race and be the fastest Timberman in a fun, tree-chopping competition! Play with 3 CPU controlled players and test your chopping skills in a crazy, fast-paced match! First on the finishing line WINS IT ALL! VS Mode: compete with another player on the same Nintendo 3DS system! Remember - the better one wins!! Join millions of players playing Timberman, now on Nintendo 3DS - featuring brand new, exciting game modes, plenty of crazy new characters to unlock, and more fun than ever!
